statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'Purchase';
SELECT interaction_timestamp, interaction_type FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE portal_id = 1 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE portal_id = 2 AND interaction_type = 'Feedback' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TotalInteractions FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE portal_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE portal_id = 456 AND interaction_type = 'click' LIMIT 10;
SELECT interaction_timestamp, interaction_type, interaction_data->'message' AS message FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE portal_id IN (789, 890) ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_interactions, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM interaction_timestamp) AS month FROM CustomerInteractions GROUP BY month ORDER BY month;

SELECT DISTINCT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM interaction_timestamp) = 2022 GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_interactions > 5 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM interactions_table;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM interactions_table WHERE interaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT page_visited, time_spent_seconds FROM portal_usage_table WHERE time_spent_seconds > 60;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type FROM interactions_table ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM portal_usage_table WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM interactions_table WHERE interaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM interactions_table GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_interactions > 5 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(time_spent_seconds) AS max_time_spent FROM portal_usage_table GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY max_time_spent DESC;

SELECT * FROM interactions_table JOIN portal_usage_table ON interactions_table.customer_id = portal_usage_table.customer_id WHERE interactions_table.interaction_type = 'engagement' AND portal_usage_table.time_spent_seconds > 60 ORDER BY interactions_table.interaction_date DESC, portal_usage_table.time_spent_seconds ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM interactions_table WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM portal_usage_table WHERE page_visited = 'homepage');
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_details FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM portal_usage WHERE user_id = 200 AND time_spent_seconds > 60;
SELECT page_name, server_response_time_ms FROM performance_monitoring WHERE cpu_utilization < 0.5;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM portal_usage ORDER BY visit_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT DISTINCT page_name, server_response_time_ms FROM performance_monitoring WHERE server_response_time_ms > 100 ORDER BY server_response_time_ms ASC;
SELECT user_id, page_visited, time_spent_seconds FROM portal_usage WHERE page_visited LIKE '%homepage%' AND time_spent_seconds > 60;
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_type, interaction_details FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_duration > 10;
SELECT DISTINCT interaction_type FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_timestamp FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM portal_usage WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Call' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, page_visited FROM portal_usage WHERE visit_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND visit_timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_monitoring WHERE metric_value > 100 ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM optimization_data WHERE optimization_type = 'Algorithm' AND LENGTH(optimization_details) > 100 ORDER BY optimization_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_interaction;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM customer_interaction WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_duration FROM customer_interaction WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting' ORDER BY interaction_duration DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_age FROM customer_data WHERE customer_country = 'USA';
SELECT customer_id, cpu_usage, memory_usage, disk_space_usage FROM performance_monitoring WHERE customer_id IN (456, 789) ORDER BY cpu_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE customer_country = 'USA';
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM customer_data ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_data WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, customer_country, customer_age FROM customer_data WHERE customer_age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM customer_interaction WHERE interaction_type = 'support';
